body:
<!-- Please only use this template for submitting reports about flaky tests or jobs (pass or fail with no underlying change in code) in Kubernetes CI -->

**Which jobs are flaking**:
pull-kubernetes-e2e-gce

**Which test(s) are flaking**:
storage tests

**Testgrid link**:
https://storage.googleapis.com/k8s-gubernator/triage/index.html?text=metrics%3A%20the%20server%20is%20currently%20unable%20to%20handle%20the%20request

**Reason for failure**:
Probably unnecessary load on the metrics endpoints.

```
Jun 18 19:37:35.868: Error getting Kubelet e2e-50bc3b6a92-674b9-minion-group-6d17 metrics: the server is currently unable to handle the request (get nodes e2e-50bc3b6a92-674b9-minion-group-6d17:10250)
Unexpected error:
    <*errors.StatusError | 0xc000e1f220>: {
        ErrStatus: {
            TypeMeta: {Kind: "", APIVersion: ""},
            ListMeta: {
                SelfLink: "",
                ResourceVersion: "",
                Continue: "",
                RemainingItemCount: nil,
            },
            Status: "Failure",
            Message: "the server is currently unable to handle the request (get nodes e2e-50bc3b6a92-674b9-minion-group-6d17:10250)",
            Reason: "ServiceUnavailable",
            Details: {
                Name: "e2e-50bc3b6a92-674b9-minion-group-6d17:10250",
                Group: "",
                Kind: "nodes",
                UID: "",
                Causes: [
                    {
                        Type: "UnexpectedServerResponse",
                        Message: "Error trying to reach service: 'dial tcp 10.40.0.3:10250: i/o timeout'",
                        Field: "",
                    },
                ],
                RetryAfterSeconds: 0,
            },
            Code: 503,
        },
    }
    the server is currently unable to handle the request (get nodes e2e-50bc3b6a92-674b9-minion-group-6d17:10250)
```

**Anything else we need to know**:
- links to go.k8s.io/triage appreciated
- links to specific failures in spyglass appreciated

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Storage.
labels.name: sig/storage

title: Don't collect metrics if csi migration is not being tested
